normalised: Brand Collaborations: Influencers Cash In This Festive Season!

unnormalised: **Brand Collabs: Influencers Cash In This Festive Season!**
normalised: Social media is buzzing! This Onam, it is not just pookalams and payasam trending. Brand collaborations are going absolutely bonkers, especially in the influencer marketing space.

unnormalised: Social media is buzzing! This Onam, it's not just pookalams and payasam trending. Brand collaborations are going absolutely bonkers, especially in the influencer marketing space.
normalised: From fashion hauls by Delhi's Komal Pandey showcasing new ethnic wear collections to food bloggers in Hyderabad reviewing the best biryani in town (paid, obviously!), brands are throwing rupees lakhs at influencers.

unnormalised: From fashion hauls by Delhi's Komal Pandey showcasing new ethnic wear collections to food bloggers in Hyderabad reviewing the *best* biryani in town (paid, obviously!), brands are throwing Rs. lakhs at influencers.
normalised: Even smaller local businesses are getting in on the action. Chennai's "Saravana Sweets" collaborated with a micro-influencer to promote their Onam special adai pradhaman, reportedly seeing a thirty percent jump in sales.

unnormalised: Even smaller local businesses are getting in on the action. Chennai's "Saravana Sweets" collaborated with a micro-influencer to promote their Onam special adai pradhaman, reportedly seeing a 30% jump in sales.
normalised: Remember that tech guru, Rohan from I I T Bombay? He is now doing sponsored reviews of the latest smartphones!

unnormalised: Remember that tech guru, Rohan from IIT Bombay? He's now doing sponsored reviews of the latest smartphones!
normalised: Analysts predict this trend will only intensify. With Diwali just around the corner, expect even more lavish collaborations and maybe even a glimpse of your favourite influencer endorsing a new type of ladoo. Looks like everyone is hungry for a piece of the collab pie!

unnormalised: Analysts predict this trend will only intensify. With Diwali just around the corner, expect even more lavish collabs and maybe even a glimpse of your favourite influencer endorsing a new type of ladoo. Looks like everyone's hungry for a piece of the collab pie!
